food.name: Pizza Margherita
food.description: A classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil.

food.name: Burger
food.description: A delicious burger with a juicy beef patty, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and served in a soft bun.

food.name: Pasta Carbonara
food.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, pancetta, eggs, Parmesan cheese, and a generous sprinkle of black pepper.

food.name: Salad
food.description: A fresh and healthy salad made with crisp lettuce, tomato, cucumber, bell pepper, and your choice of dressing.

food.name: Dosa
food.description: Dosa is a popular South Indian crepe made from a fermented batter of rice and urad dal. It is usually served with various chutneys and sambar.

food.name: Maggi
food.description: Maggi is a brand of instant noodles known for its quick preparation. Simply boil the noodles, add the Maggi masala, and enjoy a delicious snack.

food.name: Manchurian
food.description: Manchurian is a popular Indo-Chinese dish made from deep-fried vegetable balls, typically served with a flavorful Manchurian sauce.

food.name: Cake
food.description: Cake is a classic dessert made from a mixture of flour, sugar, eggs, butter, and flavorings. It can be customized with various toppings and frostings.

food.name: Fried Rice
food.description: Fried rice is a popular Chinese dish made by stir-frying cooked rice with a variety of ingredients such as vegetables, eggs, and seasonings.
